title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Fry the pancetta in a pan until crispy.
Whisk the eggs with grated Parmesan and black pepper.
Combine the hot spaghetti with the pancetta and egg mixture.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt and garam masala for 2 hours.
Grill the chicken until slightly charred.
Saute onions and spices in a pan until fragrant.
Add canned tomatoes and cook until thickened.
Stir in grilled chicken and simmer for 10 minutes.

title: Vegetarian Buddha Bowl
summary: A wholesome and nutritious bowl with quinoa, roasted vegetables, and a tangy tahini dressing.
instructions: Cook the quinoa according to package instructions.
Roast sweet potato and broccoli in the oven until tender.
Slice the avocado and prepare other toppings as needed.
Assemble the bowl with quinoa, roasted veggies, and avocado.
Drizzle tahini dressing over the top and serve.
